data.title: Actually specification language is used during software development .pdf
data.meta_description: Actually specification language is used during software development .pdf - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text: Actually specification language is used during software development life cycle such as system analysis,Requirement analysis and system design.This language helps indirectly to produce the executable code for a system. Def : The Z Specification language is a formal specification language that makes simple to write mathematical descriptions of hard dynamic systems such as computer software.Usually descriptions are smaller and easier than any programming language has.Descriptions consists of both formal and informal parts. Advantages of Z-Notation are : Disadvantages are : Solution Actually specification language is used during software development life cycle such as system analysis,Requirement analysis and system design.This language helps indirectly to produce the executable code for a system. Def : The Z Specification language is a formal specification language that makes simple to write mathematical descriptions of hard dynamic systems such as computer software.Usually descriptions are smaller and easier than any programming language has.Descriptions consists of both formal and informal parts.
